title: Chickpea and Walnut Salad with Lemon
directions: Mash the chickpeas in a small serving bowl with the back of a fork. Add the walnuts. Whisk together the lemon juice, oil, garlic and salt in a small bowl. Combine the dressing with the chickpea-walnut mixture. Chill.
Just before serving, fill crisp lettuce wrappers with a heaping spoonful of the mixture and arrange on a platter. Serve immediately.
ingredients: 1 (15 oz.) canÂ or 1 and 1/2 c. cooked, drained chickpeas
